title: The First REAL KFP In The New Studio - Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 238)
description:
Watch The Rings of Power on Prime Video and download the Amazon Music app to listen to all eight episodes of The Official The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power Podcast for free on Amazon Music.

Go to http://policygenius.com to get your free life insurance quotes and see how much you
could save.

Greg, Tim, Nick, and Andy record their very first REAL Kinda Funny Podcast on the new set in The Spare Bedroom and try to push the limits on foods they would eat.
